data.name: Flying Circus
data.detailed_description:
Parents left sector hotel-oscar-mike-echo, we can proceed with operation Flying Circus. Lead our units to defeat the enemy, and gain control over all toys in the house.
Flying Circus is an arcade flying simulator where you can fly model aircrafts across the house.


Flying Circus contains 40 unique missions. From classical tower defense and assault, to convoying and great battle .


Flying Circus gives you ability to fly 14 unique models of aircrafts from the time of WWII all over the house. Collect Golden Stars to unlock better planes.


Every time you unlock new aircraft, you start with clean, gray plastic. There are 54 camouflages hidden all over the house. Collect them all to unlock elite golden color schemes, which you can use in multiplayer.


Coming Soon:


Arcade Mode
You have to survive! Set up allied units to enhance defense. Collect better armament and better aircrafts, which appear in the house to beat next waves of enemies.

Multiplayer Mode
Multiplayer contains 4 different gamemodes:
-deathmatch
-team deathmatch
-domination
-infected

Full Controller Support

Steam Leaderboards

data.short_description: Parents left sector hotel-oscar-mike-echo, we can proceed with operation Flying Circus. Lead our units to defeat the enemy, and gain control over all toys in the house.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 @ 3.30GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 / Radeon HD 7790
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: These are suggested minimal requirements. Flying Circus may run on older or weaker configurations.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 @ 2.70GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 / Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
